title: Third-Order Nonlinear Semi-Canonical Functional Differential Equations: Oscillation via New Canonical Transform
content:
This paper focuses on the oscillatory properties of the semi-canonical nonlinear delay differential equation of third-order

	(δ₂(t)(δ₁(t)ζ′(t))′)^{′α}(τ(t))=0,  t≥t₀,

under the conditions

	∫_{t₀}^{∞}(1/(δ₂(t)))dt=∞  and  ∫_{t₀}^{∞}(1/(δ₁(t)))dt
